name: Bram de Vos
intro: The common thread through Bram de Vos' work is to provide answers to the 'pain' cities are facing. As a designer, Bram brings disconnected ideas together into a large overall plan, designing forward-thinking urban solutions. In short, a cohesive masterplan.
content_1: Local food production can make a city more resilient and create spaces for social interaction throughout all sorts of backgrounds and cultures resulting in a stronger sense of community. We are showcasing a variety of proposals on how to bring agriculture and the city closer together focusing on alternative farming approaches that are space-efficient, ecological and sustainable.
